td.content: s:patient presents with Kidney. he is a M aged 50 Ys. he has approx. a 30 pack/year history of smoking Patient reports that he never drinks alcohol o:Height 67 in, Weight 158 lbs, Temperature 99.1 F, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 16 a:Acute Renal Failure p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Isotonic Saline (0.9%) - 10 mL/kg per dose, and ordered Basic Metabolic Panel, Sodium, Urine, FENa.

td.content: s:a white m security guard aged 51 yrs presents with 5 months history of Kidney. he has approx. a 30 pack/year history of smoking denies any alcohol use o:Height 67 in, Weight 155 lbs, Temperature 98.7 F, Pulse 72, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 17 a:Acute Renal Failure p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Isotonic Saline (0.9%) - 10 mL/kg per dose, and ordered US Kidney.
